medium: Pigments and ink on paper, collage
title: Ketubah (marriage contract)
text: This ketubah was commissioned by the Minneapolis Institute of Arts and donated by artist Judy Freeman.
description: backing board airbrushed in rainbow design; Aramaic text at L, English at R; cut paper cityscape in gold at bottom; applied cut-out flame, arc and triangle shapes, some raised from surface, in various colors
creditline: Gift of the artist in honor of her husband, Todd Freeman, and her children, Jennifer, Katie and Zachary
